languages.text: {n}В глазах ксеноса вспыхивает интерес.{/n} "Мон-кай понимает мою речь! Откуда ты взял{mf||а} прибор, что переводит наш язык? Хочешь впечатлить меня, показавшись полезным? За подобные слова ты получишь только раунд на ринге. Без оружия. И без кожи".

traits.locale_text: {n}В глазах ксеноса вспыхивает интерес.{/n} "Мон-кай понимает мою речь! Откуда ты взял{mf||а} прибор, что переводит наш язык? Хочешь впечатлить меня, показавшись полезным? За подобные слова ты получишь только раунд на ринге. Без оружия. И без кожи".

languages.text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах ксеноса вспыхивает интерес.{/n} "Мон-кай понимает мою речь! Откуда ты взял{mf||а} прибор, что переводит наш язык? Хочешь впечатлить меня, показавшись полезным? За подобные слова ты получишь только раунд на ринге. Без оружия. И без кожи".

traits.locale_text: {n}The alien's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you get the device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? At best, such words will earn you a bout in the ring with no weapons. Or skin."

Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

languages.text: {n}異種族の目が好奇心で光る。{/n}「モン＝ケイが私の話を理解できるとは！こちらの言語を翻訳する装置はどこで手に入れた？役に立つところを見せてアピールする気か？そんな発言はせいぜいリングで一戦獲得できる程度。武器は奪われ、そのうち皮膚も奪われる」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の目が好奇心で光る。{/n}「モン＝ケイが私の話を理解できるとは！こちらの言語を翻訳する装置はどこで手に入れた？役に立つところを見せてアピールする気か？そんな発言はせいぜいリングで一戦獲得できる程度。武器は奪われ、そのうち皮膚も奪われる」

languages.text: {n}异形看着你，目光中充满了兴趣。{/n}“这只猴子居然能听懂我说的话！这件装置可以翻译我们的语言，你是从哪里弄到的？你是打算让自己看起来很有用，以此给我留下深刻印象吗？既然如此，我可以让你多打一场。当然，你没有武器，而且用不了多久，你的皮也会一起没了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

traits.locale_text: {n}异形看着你，目光中充满了兴趣。{/n}“这只猴子居然能听懂我说的话！这件装置可以翻译我们的语言，你是从哪里弄到的？你是打算让自己看起来很有用，以此给我留下深刻印象吗？既然如此，我可以让你多打一场。当然，你没有武器，而且用不了多久，你的皮也会一起没了。”

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de la xénos brillent soudain d'intérêt.{/n} « Ah, {mf|le|la} mon-keigh peut donc comprendre ce que je dis ! Où avez-vous bien pu trouver un appareil capable de traduire notre langue ? Seriez-vous en train d'essayer de m'impressionner et de me faire croire que vous êtes d'une quelconque utilité ? Voilà qui mériterait un petit tour dans l'arène. Sans arme, et, bientôt, sans même votre peau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de la xénos brillent soudain d'intérêt.{/n} « Ah, {mf|le|la} mon-keigh peut donc comprendre ce que je dis ! Où avez-vous bien pu trouver un appareil capable de traduire notre langue ? Seriez-vous en train d'essayer de m'impressionner et de me faire croire que vous êtes d'une quelconque utilité ? Voilà qui mériterait un petit tour dans l'arène. Sans arme, et, bientôt, sans même votre peau. »

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de la xenos se iluminan con interés.{/n} «¡{mf|El|La} mon-keigh entiende mi idioma! ¿De dónde has sacado un dispositivo que traduce nuestra lengua? ¿Intentas impresionarme siendo útil? Con esas palabras, como mucho te ganas una pelea en el ring. Sin armas, y pronto sin piel».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de la xenos se iluminan con interés.{/n} «¡{mf|El|La} mon-keigh entiende mi idioma! ¿De dónde has sacado un dispositivo que traduce nuestra lengua? ¿Intentas impresionarme siendo útil? Con esas palabras, como mucho te ganas una pelea en el ring. Sin armas, y pronto sin piel».

languages.text: {n}Interesse blitzt in den Augen der Xenos auf.{/n} "Der Chem-Pan-Sey versteht mich! Woher habt Ihr ein Gerät, das unsere Sprache übersetzen kann? Versucht Ihr, mich zu beeindrucken, indem Ihr nützlich wirkt? Solche Worte verdienen Euch bestenfalls einen Kampf im Ring. Ohne Waffen und bald auch ohne Eure Haut."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Interesse blitzt in den Augen der Xenos auf.{/n} "Der Chem-Pan-Sey versteht mich! Woher habt Ihr ein Gerät, das unsere Sprache übersetzen kann? Versucht Ihr, mich zu beeindrucken, indem Ihr nützlich wirkt? Solche Worte verdienen Euch bestenfalls einen Kampf im Ring. Ohne Waffen und bald auch ohne Eure Haut."

languages.text: {n}Zenonun uyanan ilgisi, gözlerine yansıyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh söylediklerimi anlıyor! Dilimizi tercüme edebilen cihazı nereden buldun? Böyle şeylerin olduğunu göstererek beni etkilemeye mi çalışıyorsun? Böylesi sözlerle en fazla kendine ringde yer edinebilirsin. Silahların olmadan elbette... Sonra da derine veda edersin."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes light up with interest.{/n} "The mon-keigh understands my speech! Where did you come by a device that can translate our language? Are you trying to impress me by appearing useful? Such words will earn you a bout in the ring at most. Without weapons, and, soon, without your skin."

Böyle şeylerin olduğunu göstererek beni etkilemeye mi çalışıyorsun? Böylesi sözlerle en fazla kendine ringde yer edinebilirsin. Silahların olmadan elbette... Sonra da derine veda edersin."
